name.ja: セレブローブ・デスワインド

requirement.en: Equip this card to 1 face-up LIGHT Attribute Spellcaster Type monster on your field.

effect.en: The equipped monster gains 400 ATK and cannot be destroyed by your opponent's card effects. If you use the equipped monster as material for a Fusion Summon while you have "Celeb Rose Magician" in your Graveyard, its name can be treated as "Celeb Rose Magician".
